name: Lonely Light (PixelmationGames)
description:
Lonely Light is a simple top-down game about exploring an abandoned house and finding loot inside. The house is populated with deadly monsters which fear only the light. You can defend yourself with your flashlight, but be careful, because the battery is limited. Collect as many coins and gems you can, and try to leave the house alive.

There might be some scary moments, but the game doesn't have any "in-your-face" jumpscares.
